mcq.statement: On whose advice did Begum Shaista Ikram-ullah establish the Muslim Students Federation (women wing) in Delhi?
mcq.one_liner: Begum Shaista Ikram-ullah established the Muslim Students Federation (women wing) in Delhi on the advice of **Quaid-i-Azam**.

suggestions.topic: Muhammad Ali Jinnah and Muslim League (1913)
Muhammad Ali Jinnah and Muslim League (1913)
